```{r}
A<-c(0.2,0.8)
B<-c(0.5,0.5)

HA<-sum(-log(A)*A)
HB<-sum(-log(B)*B)
HA
HB
```
```{r}
HA+HB
```

```{r}
C<-A %*% t(B)
C
```

```{r}
sum(-log(C)*C)

```
